snippet.title: Legend of Spyro: Eternal Night Mobile Game
snippet.description: The sequel to the acclaimed Legend of Spyro: New Beginning is coming to mobile. Spyro is on a quest to find out who he is, and what it means to be a powerful dragon. Guide him through 13 levels of action and mayhem. The riveting storyline, new enemies, and immersive environments get your adrenaline pumping.
